file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 57-43-01-04 - WING LEADING EDGE VORTILLONS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL WING LEADING EDGE VORTILLONS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Vortillons of the wing leading edge III. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 57-43-01-000-801-A VORTILLONS - REMOVAL ALL 57-43-01-400-801-A VORTILLONS - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 57-43-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 57-43-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. VORTILLONS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Vortillons. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 513 Wing leading edge III - LH 613 Wing leading edge III - RH C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Work stand To get access to the work area 1 available E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the wing leading edge III H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the work stand in the work area. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the five screws (1). (2) Carefully pull and remove the Vortillon (2). NOTE: Make sure that the interface sealant is not damaged. If necessary, apply sealant again. Refer to the SRM 51-20-01. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 57-43-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Vortillons - Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 613 A ZONE 513 B DET. A 1. SCREW (5) 2. VORTILLON DET. B TYPICAL 145AMM570049.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 57-43-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 57-43-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. VORTILLONS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Vortillons. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 513 Wing leading edge III - LH 613 Wing leading edge III - RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Work stand To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-G-46886 Grease, Molikote, DC-33, Light AR MEP 09-083 Sealant PR 2050 B-1/2 AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the wing leading edge III I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Remove all the old aerodynamic sealant from the skin of the wing leading edge III. Use a plastic spatula for this. (2) Apply the Molikote DC-33 light grease at the base of the Vortillon (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 57-43-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Put the Vortillon (2) in its installation position on the skin of the wing leading edge III. (4) Install the five screws (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do the aerodynamic sealing (SRM 51-20-01). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 57-43-01 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
